Significance: First CNN to demonstrate large-scale success in image classification.
Key Features: ReLU activation, dropout, overlapping pooling, 5 conv + 3 fully connected layers.

Significance: Baseline for comparing manually extracted features with automated deep learning features.
Key Features: Fully connected layers, simple structure, processes flattened image data.

Significance: Efficient multi-scale feature extraction for complex datasets.
Key Features: Inception modules, auxiliary classifiers, factorized convolutions.

Significance: Deep architecture with residual connections for gradient stability.
Key Features: Residual blocks, batch normalization, 50 layers deep.

Significance: Consistent deep architecture for high accuracy in structured datasets.
Key Features: Small 3x3 filters, sequential layers, powerful feature extraction, pre-trained weights for transfer learning.
